title: LOGIN CLIENT WONT LOAD PROPERLY!??!?!?!?!!
body:
Im trying to open my league, but the login page just loads as a blank screen? I can hear the login music but cant see or do anything?
been 3 days now and i cant find any help
Ive already redownloaded and reinstalled doing the same fucking thing

Ive tried to contact support on the website and it says i need to be logged in to submit a form, WHEN IM ALREADY FUCKING LOGGED IN?!?!?!?!?
Someone please help me before i kill myself

replies.body:
The login for support is separate from the login for the website (boards). There have been some recent issues with the transition between logins. If simply pressing login doesn't work, try either logging out of boards before logging into support, or open the support page in an incognito tab and you should be able to login.
___
For your issue, I'd recommend updating graphics card drivers, and doing a *clean* reinstall (if you haven't already) using the Hextech Repair Tool: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool

If that doesn't work support is your best bet as I'm not sure what else might help you.

Already done everything you've suggested
Had to get a friend to send an email to the support team for me, I couldnt get through

hopefully they can help fix the issue, doing my head in
thanks.

There are two current workarounds for the support login issue (if you still need them):

1: Open the support page in an incognito/private window and follow the process as normal, pressing the login button when prompted.

2: Log out of the website **from the support page**, and then follow the process as normal, pressing login when prompted.
___

If your support page has the blank "OC" login in the top right, you're good to go. If it only has your summoner icon with "OCEANIA" it means the support page is seeing you as logged in on the website and not in support. You need to follow one of the steps above.
